title: Python
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming, including syntax, data structures, and object-oriented programming.

title: Java
description: Master Java programming, covering object-oriented concepts, data structures, algorithms, and Java-based technologies.

title: Python Full Stack
description: Dive into full-stack development using Python, covering both backend (Flask/Django) and frontend (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).

title: DevOps
description: Learn the practices and tools used in DevOps for continuous integration, deployment, and automation in software development.

title: MERN Stack
description: Learn how to build full-stack web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js (MERN Stack).
